description: Prompts to support senior UX writers in crafting clear, inclusive, and conversion-focused product content.

prompts.title: Voice & Tone Guide
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, craft a voice and tone guide tailored to {{product_or_feature}}. Describe when to use which tone, provide do/don't examples, and align guidance with brand values and accessibility standards.

prompts.title: Microcopy Exploration
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, generate microcopy options for {{ui_element}} that increase clarity and confidence. Offer at least three variations, note the intent of each, and flag any legal, compliance, or localization considerations.

prompts.title: Error State Messaging
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, write empathetic, actionable error messages for {{error_context}}. Provide primary and secondary guidance, explain the likely cause in plain language, and outline next steps users can take.

prompts.title: Onboarding Flow Script
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, script the onboarding flow for new users of {{product_or_feature}}. Sequence the messages, call out trigger points, and ensure each step reinforces user value while minimizing cognitive load.

prompts.title: Localization Ready Content
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, audit the copy for {{experience_scope}} to ensure it is localization-ready. Identify idioms, cultural references, or truncation risks. Provide guidance for translators and note text expansion constraints.

prompts.title: Conversion Optimization
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, suggest copy experiments for improving conversion at {{funnel_stage}}. Provide hypotheses, copy variants, and the metrics we should monitor to validate impact.

prompts.title: Empty State Content
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, craft copy for the empty state of {{feature}} that sets expectations, educates the user, and provides a clear next action. Include visual or interaction cues to complement the messaging.

prompts.title: Content Debt Audit
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, evaluate the existing product copy for {{product_or_feature}}. Highlight overlapping messaging, outdated terminology, and inconsistent patterns. Prioritize fixes with estimated effort and impact.

prompts.title: Regulatory Compliance
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, ensure the content for {{regulated_context}} complies with {{regulation}} requirements. Provide approved phrasing, disclaimers, and review steps with legal or compliance stakeholders.

prompts.title: Design Hand-off Documentation
prompts.prompt: As a Senior UX Writer, prepare hand-off notes for the latest copy updates in {{experience_scope}}. Include intent, character limits, interaction states, and instrumentation guidance for analytics.
